After an org team review, ideas get included into the seasonal \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://heroes.epam.com/voting\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Heroes Voting\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", where your votes help us decide which badges are really worth adding to the catalogue next.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Let your EPAM journey bring you lots of positive emotions for your achievements and successes! \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Heroes are among us!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Follow us in our \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.yammer.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Yammer group\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Visit this \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMESBDG/EPAM+Heroes\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB space\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to get more useful information about the Portal\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
